text:
Is it possible to populate additional attributes of `hs_email_headers`, or custom properties on the email engagement, from email headers?

I.e., if I send a custom-crafted email from my own application via mailgun, to a HubSpot inbox email, is this possible?

Hey guys, one of my clients sends emails from their server and emails from HubSpot, the thing is that Gmail is cutting the ones that come from HubSpot but not the ones that come from their server. I know HubSpot adds a few lines of code but even if I delete some code from HubSpot emails, they are still quite heavy, and not lying the emails are the same. Does anyone has experienced this in the past?
Gmail has a 102Kb HTML limit and most drag and drop systems will introduce a lot of cruft into the email code which contributes towards this.
Yup, that should be the case. Just wanted to confirm
